snippet: Mr. Cruz has vaulted into the top tier of the Republican race as the consummate Washington bomb thrower, but now he is taking an almost academic approach to achieving likability.
abstract: Senator Ted Cruz is working to get better at being charming, something that Cruz and his campaign as well as his colleagues on both sides of the aisle in Congress know is his weakness; Cruz appears to be adopting almost academic approach to becoming more likable, and many of moments on campaign trail meant to make him more charming can seem excessively calibrated.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cruz has vaulted into the top tier of the Republican race as the consummate Washington bomb thrower, but now he is taking an almost academic approach to achieving likability.

headline.main: After Making Enemies, Ted Cruz Tries to Make Friends
headline.print_headline: Cruz the Gruff Taking a Turn at Being Nice
